name: Interactive Ideas
tag_list: channel, it, software, red-hat, solarwinds, cryptshare, bitdefender, value-added-distributor, technology, solutions, licensing, enterprise, open-source, innovative
overview:
Interactive Ideas is a leading value-added distributor of Software and Technology products, established in 1994. Based in Enfield, North London, the company sells through a network of channel partners across the UK, Ireland and mainland Europe.

We work with vendors such as Red Hat, SolarWinds, Bitdefender, Cryptshare and EnterpriseDB,

The software solutions team work with resellers, ISV’s and systems integrators to provide software solutions, licensing and enterprise level Open Source products. In addition, Interactive Ideas provide value-added services to support the channel in delivering cost saving and innovative solutions to their customers.

Learn more: www.interactiveideas.com
